page.title: 04FARMING - DERWENT VALLEY
page.content: Other jobs include collecting eggs and cleaning byres, stables and hen houses. Surplus eggs are sold to the butcher's in the local village. There is a lot of woodland around the farm where some wildlife live; badgers, red squirrels, foxes, moles, partridges, rabbits, pheasants and deer. The farmer was born on the farm; his great grandfather was a farmer and he didn't want to do anything else. He loves farming and says that you wouldn't want to do it if you didn't like it. The farm freezes many fruits, such as blackberries, raspberries, gooseberries, strawberries, rhubarb, blackcurrants, plums and apples.
